name: RZVibrantButton
summary: The Stylish VisualEffects based UIButton Apple did not provide you. Built in Swift
description: RZVibrantButton is a stylish button with iOS 8 vibrancy effect built using Swift. It is a subclass of UIButton that has a simple yet elegant appearance and built-in support for UIVisualEffectView and UIVibrancyEffect classes introduced in iOS 8. Yet, it can be used on iOS 7 without the vibrancy effect. The design of this button is inspired by "AYVibrantButton" by alan yip.
